name: polytone
summary:
polytone is a first-person rhythm game. 

Tap on the square-shape music notes as they fly towards you along the music. 

Unique visual elements and curated music collections are our ways to provide you a brand new rhythm game experience. 

polytone offers a collection of more than 62 selected tracks (19 free-to-play + 4 unlockable + 39 purchasable + much more upcoming updates) with more than 150 levels for your challenges. The collection features top-tier EDM producers, Doujin composers and releases from renowned music labels. 

Powered by "CRIWARE". CRIWARE is a trademark of CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.
